WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I have downloaded and extracted the latest source and tried to open using C# 2010. But showing errors like
--> Cannot load tests, 
-->  Cannot Load  Libraries,
-->  Cannot Load Solution items.
 
Kindly clarify

Comments.Message:
You are using Visual Studio Express, which does not support certain Visual Studio features used by the solution (such as solution folders.)

I was able to get the parser to build in Visual Studio Express by directly adding the following projects to the solution:

  src\OopFactory.X12\OopFactory.X12.csproj
  src\OopFactory.X12.Hipaa\OopFactory.X12.Hipaa.csproj

I did not attempt to build the test projects in Visual Studio Express.

I will look into porting all the tests over to a project that uses the NUnit framework instead the Microsoft Test Project.  This should allow you to open the test projects using Visual Studio Express.
